ABILITY.NAME: Name
ABILITY.DESCRIPTION_TITLE: The flavor text of this ability
ABILITY.GENERATION_TITLE: The generation this ability originated in.

MOVE.NAME: Name
MOVE.GENERATION_TITLE: The generation in which this move was introduced.
MOVE.DAMAGE_TYPE_TITLE: The elemental type of this move.
MOVE.DAMAGE_CLASS_TITLE: The type of damage the move inflicts on the target,
MOVE.PP_TITLE: Power points. The number of times this move can be used.
MOVE.ACCURACY_TITLE: The percent value of how likely this move is to be successful.
MOVE.POWER_TITLE: The base power of this move with a value of 0 if it does not have a base power.
MOVE.PRIORITY_TITLE: A value between -8 and 8. Sets the order in which moves are executed during battle.
MOVE.STAT_CHANGE_CHANCE_TITLE: The likelihood this attack will cause a stat change in the target Pokémon.
MOVE.HEALING_TITLE: The amount of hp gained by the attacking Pokemon, in percent of it's maximum HP.
MOVE.DRAIN_RECOIL_TITLE: HP drain (if positive) or Recoil damage (if negative), in percent of damage done.
MOVE.AILMENT_TITLE: The status ailment this move inflicts on its target.
MOVE.AILMENT_CHANCE_TITLE: The likelihood this attack will cause an ailment.
MOVE.FLINCH_CHANCE_TITLE: The likelihood this attack will cause the target Pokémon to flinch.
MOVE.TARGET_TITLE: The type of target that will receive the effects of the attack.
MOVE.DESCRIPTION_TITLE: The flavor text of this move
MOVE.EFFECT_CHANCE_TITLE: The percent value of how likely it is this moves effect will happen.

STATS.TITLE_TITLE: A chart of base stat values for this Pokémon.
STATS.TITLE: Stats
STATS.BASE_TITLE: The base value of the stat.
STATS.EV_TITLE: The effort points (EV) the Pokémon has in the stat.

EVOLUTION_CHAIN.TITLE_TITLE: The evolution chain this Pokémon species is a member of.
EVOLUTION_CHAIN.TITLE: Evolution Chain

LINK.SHED_EVOLVE: Pokéball in bag and free slot in party.

INFO.TITLE: Species Info
INFO.EGG_GROUPS_TITLE: Egg Groups are categories which determine which Pokémon are able to interbreed. Pokémon may belong to either one or two Egg Groups.
INFO.BASE_HAPPINESS_TITLE: The happiness when caught by a normal Pokéball. The higher the number, the happier the Pokémon.
INFO.CAPTURE_RATE_TITLE: The base capture rate. The higher the number, the easier the catch.
INFO.FEMALE_RATE_TITLE: The chance of this Pokémon being female.
INFO.MALE_RATE_TITLE: The chance of this Pokémon being male.
INFO.GROWTH_RATE_TITLE: The rate at which this Pokémon species gains levels.
INFO.HATCH_STEPS_TITLE: Initial hatch counter: one must walk unless utilizing bonuses like Flame Body's.
INFO.GENERATION_TITLE: The generation this Pokémon species was introduced in.
INFO.HABITAT_TITLE: The habitat this Pokémon species can be encountered in.

CATEGORIES.swagger: No damage; inflicts status ailment; raises target's stats
CATEGORIES.damage+heal: Inflicts damage; absorbs damage done to heal the user
CATEGORIES.field-effect: Effect on one side of the field

specific-move.NAME: Specific move
specific-move.DESCRIPTION: One specific move. How this move is chosen depends upon on the move being used.

selected-pokemon-me-first.NAME: Selected Pokémon
selected-pokemon-me-first.DESCRIPTION: One other Pokémon on the field, selected by the trainer. Stolen moves reuse the same target.

users-field.NAME: User's field
users-field.DESCRIPTION: The user's side of the field. Affects the user and its ally (if any).

user-or-ally.NAME: User or ally
user-or-ally.DESCRIPTION: Either the user or its ally, selected by the trainer.

opponents-field.NAME: Opponent's field
opponents-field.DESCRIPTION: The opposing side of the field. Affects opposing Pokémon.

random-opponent.NAME: Random opponent
random-opponent.DESCRIPTION: One opposing Pokémon, selected at random.

all-other-pokemon.NAME: All other Pokémon
all-other-pokemon.DESCRIPTION: Every other Pokémon on the field.

selected-pokemon.NAME: Selected Pokémon
selected-pokemon.DESCRIPTION: One other Pokémon on the field, selected by the trainer.

entire-field.NAME: Entire field
entire-field.DESCRIPTION: The entire field. Affects all Pokémon.

physical.NAME: physical
physical.DESCRIPTION: Physical damage, controlled by Attack and Defense

special.NAME: special
special.DESCRIPTION: Special damage, controlled by Special Attack and Special Defense
